/admin/tool/lp/classes/external/ -> user_evidence_competency_summary_exporter.php (source)

[Summary view] [Print] [Text view] 

   1  <?php
   2  // This file is part of Moodle - http://moodle.org/
   3  //
   4  // Moodle is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
   5  // it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
   6  // the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
   7  // (at your option) any later version.
   8  //
   9  // Moodle is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
  10  // but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
  11  // MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
  12  // GNU General Public License for more details.
  13  //
  14  // You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
  15  // along with Moodle.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
  16  
  17  /**
  18   * Class for exporting user evidence competency data.
  19   *
  20   * @package    tool_lp
  21   * @copyright  2016 Serge Gauthier - <serge.gauthier.2@umontreal.ca>
  22   * @license    http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU GPL v3 or later
  23   */
  24  namespace tool_lp\external;
  25  
  26  use moodle_url;
  27  use renderer_base;
  28  use core_competency\external\competency_exporter;
  29  use core_competency\external\user_competency_exporter;
  30  
  31  /**
  32   * Class for exporting user evidence competency data.
  33   *
  34   * @copyright  2016 Serge Gauthier - <serge.gauthier.2@umontreal.ca>
  35   * @license    http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU GPL v3 or later
  36   */
  37  class user_evidence_competency_summary_exporter extends \core_competency\external\exporter {
  38  
  39      protected static function define_related() {
  40          return array('competency' => '\\core_competency\\competency',
  41                       'usercompetency' => '\\core_competency\\user_competency',
  42                       'scale' => 'grade_scale',
  43                       'context' => '\\context'
  44                      );
  45      }
  46  
  47      protected static function define_other_properties() {
  48          return array(
  49              'competency' => array(
  50                  'type' => competency_exporter::read_properties_definition()
  51              ),
  52              'usercompetency' => array(
  53                  'type' => user_competency_exporter::read_properties_definition(),
  54              )
  55          );
  56      }
  57  
  58      protected function get_other_values(renderer_base $output) {
  59          $competencyexporter = new competency_exporter($this->related['competency'],
  60                  array('context' => $this->related['context']));
  61          $usercompetencyexporter = new user_competency_exporter($this->related['usercompetency'],
  62                  array('scale' => $this->related['scale']));
  63  
  64          $values = array(
  65              'competency' => $competencyexporter->export($output),
  66              'usercompetency' => $usercompetencyexporter->export($output)
  67          );
  68  
  69          return $values;
  70      }
  71  
  72  }
